'''''Tolkien Language Notes'' 2''' is an issue of the fanzine ''Tolkien Language Notes''. 

The magazine includes [[Jim Allan]]'s[?] article "The Quenya Noun" - this includes a transcription of the manuscript page "[[The Plotz Declension]]" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
